title: District Attorney: 17-year-old man charged with killing Starr County father and son
content:
Investigators have arrested a 17-year-old Rio Grande City man accused of killing a father and son in November.
Investigators believe Jesus Angel Rebollar, 17, of Rio Grande City killed 41-year-old Hector Garcia and 3-year-old Julian Garcia on Nov. 6, said Starr County District Attorney Omar Escobar.
Rebollar is charged with two counts of capital murder, a capital felony. He was already in custody on unrelated charges.
Rebollar is being held at the Starr County jail without bond.
